tossup_question: 24) BIOLOGY  What is the primary force that holds the antiparallel stands of a DNA helix together?
bonus_question: 24) BIOLOGY  Which of the following techniques would you use to determine the 3-D structure of a protein?
bonus_MCQoptions:

X) Nuclear magnetic resonance
